forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Slight Chance Drizzle
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after 5pm. Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn unfolds over Downtown San Francisco, a gentle blanket of clouds lingers in the sky, offering a soft and muted light that casts a serene glow across the city. Though the temperatures remain mild, dipping to around 54, the wispy strands of fog seem to hold back the warmth of the sun, invoking a tranquil start to the day. With only a slight chance of drizzle creeping in as evening approaches, the promise of mostly sunny skies beckons one to explore the bustling streets, while the cool west southwest wind whispers through the air.

As the day progresses, temperatures are expected to hover around the low to mid-60s, falling gracefully as the afternoon turns to evening. Such weather calls for light layers; a light jacket or cardigan would be ideal to stay comfortable amidst the shifting temperatures. This is not the day for elaborate outings; rather, a leisurely stroll through the beautiful parks or a quiet visit to a local café to enjoy a good book may be the perfect way to savor the moment. Take a leisurely afternoon to bask in the ambiance of the city, as life unfolds its routines against a backdrop of cool breezes and fleeting sunshine.
